item.title: Raymarching
item.description: I always was very interested into fractals, notably I played quite a fair bit with Apophysis. That’s how I created these images: As you can see, there was also transparency. They look very different on a white or on a black background, you can try (for the first two ones) So it was really nice, but I had no idea how to render fractals. And I didn’t care. Now the time has come.
